      Method that must be defined in TemplateTSP subclasses
      void searchSolution​(int timeLimit, Graph g)
      Search for a shortest cost hamiltonian circuit in g within timeLimit milliseconds (returns the best found tour whenever the time limit is reached) Warning: The computed tour always start from vertex 0

      • searchSolution

        public void searchSolution​(int timeLimit,
                           Graph g)
        Description copied from interface: TSP
        Search for a shortest cost hamiltonian circuit in g within timeLimit milliseconds (returns the best found tour whenever the time limit is reached) Warning: The computed tour always start from vertex 0
        Specified by:
        searchSolution in interface TSP

      • getSolution

        public java.lang.Integer getSolution​(int i)
        Specified by:
        getSolution in interface TSP
        Returns:
        the ith visited vertex in the solution computed by searchSolution (-1 if searchSolution has not been called yet, or if i < 0 or i >= g.getNbVertices())

      • getSolutionCost

        public int getSolutionCost()
        Specified by:
        getSolutionCost in interface TSP
        Returns:
        the total cost of the solution computed by searchSolution (-1 if searchSolution has not been called yet).

      • bound

        protected abstract int bound​(java.lang.Integer currentVertex,
                             java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> unvisited)
        Method that must be defined in TemplateTSP subclasses
        Parameters:
        currentVertex -
        unvisited -
        Returns:
        a lower bound of the cost of paths in g starting from currentVertex, visiting every vertex in unvisited exactly once, and returning back to vertex 0.

      • iterator

        Method that must be defined in TemplateTSP subclasses
        Parameters:
        currentVertex -
        unvisited -
        g -
        Returns:
        an iterator for visiting all vertices in unvisited which are successors of currentVertex

      • branchAndBound

        private void branchAndBound​(int currentVertex,
                            java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> unvisited,
                            java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> visited,
                            int currentCost)
        Template method of a branch and bound algorithm for solving the TSP in g.
        Parameters:
        currentVertex - the last visited vertex
        unvisited - the set of vertex that have not yet been visited
        visited - the sequence of vertices that have been already visited (including currentVertex)
        currentCost - the cost of the path corresponding to visited
